entries.name: generate(size [, generator]) → dhclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Creates a new DH instance from scratch by generating the private and public components alike.

entries.name: compute_key(pub_bn) → aStringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a String containing a shared secret computed from the other party's public value. See DH_compute_key() for further information.

entries.name: generate_key! → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Generates a private and public key unless a private key already exists. If this DH instance was generated from public DH parameters (e.g. by encoding the result of #public_key), then this method needs to be called first in order to generate the per-session keys before performing the actual key exchange.

entries.name: params → hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Stores all parameters of key to the hash INSECURE: PRIVATE INFORMATIONS CAN LEAK OUT!!! Don't use :-)) (I's up to you)

entries.name: params_ok? → true | falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Validates the Diffie-Hellman parameters associated with this instance. It checks whether a safe prime and a suitable generator are used. If this is not the case, false is returned.

entries.name: private? → true | falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Indicates whether this DH instance has a private key associated with it or not. The private key may be retrieved with DH#priv_key.

entries.name: public? → true | falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Indicates whether this DH instance has a public key associated with it or not. The public key may be retrieved with DH#pub_key.

entries.name: public_key → aDHclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new DH instance that carries just the public information, i.e. the prime p and the generator g, but no public/private key yet. Such a pair may be generated using #generate_key!. The “public key” needed for a key exchange with #compute_key is considered as per-session information and may be retrieved with DH#pub_key once a key pair has been generated. If the current instance already contains private information (and thus a valid public/private key pair), this information will no longer be present in the new instance generated by #public_key. This feature is helpful for publishing the Diffie-Hellman parameters without leaking any of the private per-session information.

entries.name: set_key(pub_key, priv_key) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets pub_key and priv_key for the DH instance. priv_key may be nil.

entries.name: set_pqg(p, q, g) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets p, q, g to the DH instance.

entries.name: to_der → aStringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Encodes this DH to its DER encoding. Note that any existing per-session public/private keys will not get encoded, just the Diffie-Hellman parameters will be encoded.

entries.name: to_text → aStringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Prints all parameters of key to buffer INSECURE: PRIVATE INFORMATIONS CAN LEAK OUT!!! Don't use :-)) (I's up to you)
